Text: A/10, V/10, very clear copy, Matroska seems to be crystal clear, thanks vicerock, great copy
Thanks Vice mate. +1. The film was wonderful. Please do upload more russian movies....
Video bitrate could stand to be much greater. Very compressed video picture. Apart from that a very nice encode.

Very good given its size. And a hell of a movie! Gonna keep this one, especially with 5.1 sound. For those looking for subtitles in other lang than eng (is included) may want to search by it's original russian title, 9 rota.
